languages.text: {n}Потрескавшаяся кожа псайкера, кажется, готова рассыпаться, но тассерцевые глаза горят нездешним огнем.{/n} "Ритуал почти завершен, господин. Алтарь Перемен готов необратимо поменять нити судеб".

{n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."
languages.original_text: {n}Потрескавшаяся кожа псайкера, кажется, готова рассыпаться, но тассерцевые глаза горят нездешним огнем.{/n} "Ритуал почти завершен, господин. Алтарь Перемен готов необратимо поменять нити судеб".

traits.locale_text: {n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

{n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

{n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

{n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

{n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

languages.text: {n}Die rissige Haut des Psionikers scheint gleich zu Staub zu zerfallen, aber seine Thassertium-Augen brennen mit einem außerweltlichen Feuer.{/n} "Das Ritual ist fast abgeschlossen, Herr. Der Altar der Veränderung ist bereit, die Fäden des Schicksal unwiderruflich zu verdrehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die rissige Haut des Psionikers scheint gleich zu Staub zu zerfallen, aber seine Thassertium-Augen brennen mit einem außerweltlichen Feuer.{/n} "Das Ritual ist fast abgeschlossen, Herr. Der Altar der Veränderung ist bereit, die Fäden des Schicksal unwiderruflich zu verdrehen."

languages.text: {n}La peau craquelée du psyker semble sur le point de tomber en poussière, mais ses yeux en thassertium brûlent d'un feu surnaturel.{/n} « Le rituel est presque terminé, Votre Seigneurie L'Autel du changement est prêt à révolutionner les fils de la destinée. »
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}La peau craquelée du psyker semble sur le point de tomber en poussière, mais ses yeux en thassertium brûlent d'un feu surnaturel.{/n} « Le rituel est presque terminé, Votre Seigneurie L'Autel du changement est prêt à révolutionner les fils de la destinée. »

languages.text: {n}雕塑师皴裂的皮肤似乎快要化为了飞灰，但塔瑟拉水晶构成的双眼中，却燃烧着仿佛来自另一个世界的火焰。{/n}“仪式马上就要完成了，大人。诡变祭坛即将彻底扭转命运的丝线。”
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}雕塑师皴裂的皮肤似乎快要化为了飞灰，但塔瑟拉水晶构成的双眼中，却燃烧着仿佛来自另一个世界的火焰。{/n}“仪式马上就要完成了，大人。诡变祭坛即将彻底扭转命运的丝线。”

languages.text: {n}La piel agrietada del psíquico parece a punto de derrumbarse, pero sus ojos de thassertio arden con un fuego sobrenatural.{/n} «El ritual está casi completo, mi señor. El Altar del Cambio está listo para intercambiar irrevocablemente los hilos del destino».
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}La piel agrietada del psíquico parece a punto de derrumbarse, pero sus ojos de thassertio arden con un fuego sobrenatural.{/n} «El ritual está casi completo, mi señor. El Altar del Cambio está listo para intercambiar irrevocablemente los hilos del destino».

languages.text: {n}異能者のひび割れた肌は塵となって崩れ落ちそうだが、彼のタッセリウムの瞳は異世界の炎で燃えている。{/n}「儀式はほぼ完了しています、我が主人よ。変化の祭壇は運命の糸を不可逆的に切り替える準備が整っています」
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}異能者のひび割れた肌は塵となって崩れ落ちそうだが、彼のタッセリウムの瞳は異世界の炎で燃えている。{/n}「儀式はほぼ完了しています、我が主人よ。変化の祭壇は運命の糸を不可逆的に切り替える準備が整っています」

languages.text: {n}Ruhsezerin çatlak cildi, neredeyse toza dönüşmek üzereyken tasertiyumdan gözlerindeyse başka dünyadan bir alev yanıyor.{/n} "Ayin neredeyse tamamlandı lordum. Dönüşüm Sunağı, kaderin ipliklerini geri dönülmez şekilde değiştirmeye hazır."
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker's cracked skin seems ready to crumble to dust, but his thassertium eyes burn with an otherworldly fire.{/n} "The ritual is nearly complete, my lord. The Altar of Change is ready to irrevocably switch the threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruhsezerin çatlak cildi, neredeyse toza dönüşmek üzeredir ancak tasertiyumdan gözlerindeyse başka dünyadan bir alev yanmaktadır.{/n} "Ayin neredeyse tamamlandı lordum. Dönüşüm Sunağı, kaderin ipliklerini geri dönülmez şekilde değiştirmeye hazır."
